list.title: 获取优化列表

req_query.name: type
req_query.desc: 类型：1-栏目，2-产品，3-文章，4-视频

list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"200"}},"message":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"ok"}},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"current_page":{"type":"number"},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"seo_id":{"type":"number","description":"当前优化对应的数据库表id, type:column->column_id,type:category->category_id,type_product->product_id..."},"revision":{"type":"number"},"created_at":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"type":"string"},"merchant_id":{"type":"number"},"site_id":{"type":"number"},"pid":{"type":"integer","description":"父级Id"},"seo_name":{"type":"string","description":"栏目/页面名称"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"优化类型：栏目column/产品product/文章artical/视频video","enum":["column","product","artical","video"],"default":"column"},"seo_title":{"type":"string","description":"seo标题"},"seo_descrition":{"type":"string","description":"seo描述"},"seo_keyword":{"type":"string","description":"seo关键词"},"path":{"type":"string","description":"页面路径"}}}},"first_page_url":{"type":"string"},"from":{"type":"number"},"last_page":{"type":"number"},"last_page_url":{"type":"string"},"next_page_url":{"type":"null"},"path":{"type":"string"},"per_page":{"type":"number"},"prev_page_url":{"type":"null"},"to":{"type":"number"},"total":{"type":"number"}}},"timestamp":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@timestamp"}}},"required":["code","message","data","timestamp"]}

list.title: 登录
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer"}},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer"}},"merchant_id":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer"}},"name":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"nickname":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"avatar":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"gender":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer"},"enum":[0,1],"enumDesc":"0男 1女"},"gender_text":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"},"default":"男","enum":["男","女"]},"mobile":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"email":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"status":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@integer"},"enum":["0","1"],"default":"0","enumDesc":"0正常 1禁用"},"status_text":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"},"enum":["正常","禁用"],"default":"正常"},"user_type":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@integer"},"default":"0","enumDesc":"0正常 1测试","enum":["0","1"]},"user_type_text":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"},"default":"正常","enum":["正常","测试"]},"created_at":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@datetime"}},"updated_at":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@datetime"}},"token":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}}},"required":["id","merchant_id","name","nickname","avatar","gender","mobile","email","created_at","updated_at","token","gender_text","user_type","status","status_text","user_type_text"]},"message":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@string"}},"timestamp":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer"}}},"required":["code","data","message","timestamp"]}

list.title: 更新产品参数
list.req_body_other: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"category_ids":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":99,"exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true}},"id":{"type":"integer","description":"1"},"is_allow_img":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1]},"status":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1]},"is_require":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1]},"sort_num":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":9999,"exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true},"param_type":{"type":"integer","enum":[1,2,3],"enumDesc":"1 => 文本 ，setting实例：{\"default\",\"111\"}\n2 => 单选 ，setting实例：{\"option\":[\"yes\",\"no\"],\"default\",\"yes\"}\n3 => 多选 ，setting实例：{\"option\":[\"blue\",\"red\",\"yellow\"],\"default\",[\"blue\",\"yellow\"]}"},"param_name":{"type":"string"},"setting":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"{\"default\":\"xxxx\"}"}},"site_id":{"type":"integer","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"is_common":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1]}},"required":["id"]}

新增分类

list.title: 获取子分类

req_query.name: ids
req_query.desc: 需要获取的子分类的父级分类Id，多个逗号隔开

req_query.name: category_type
req_query.desc: 分类类型：1-》产品 2-》文章，3-》视频

list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"number"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"total":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"number"},"description":"所有的子分类id"},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"description":"每个分类对应的子分类id"}}},"message":{"type":"string"},"timestamp":{"type":"number"},"traceId":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","data","message","timestamp","traceId"]}

list.title: 获取分类列表

req_query.name: category_type
req_query.desc: 分类类型 ，1-> 产品,2-> 文章,3->视频

req_query.name: status
req_query.desc: 启用状态,不传默认所有

req_query.name: with_column
